definitions.definition: Subject to frequent changes in direction .
Moving from one object to another; not looking directly and steadily at the person with whom one is speaking .
Having the appearance of being dishonest , criminal , or unreliable .
examples: He was a shifty character in a seedy bar, and I checked my wallet was still there after talking to him.

definitions.definition: Resourceful ; full of, or ready with, shifts or expedients .

main_definition: Subject to frequent changes in direction .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person's eyes ) Moving from one object to another; not looking directly and steadily at the person with whom one is speaking .
Having the appearance of being dishonest , criminal , or unreliable .
Resourceful ; full of, or ready with, shifts or expedients .
